title: Please remove Sona from ARAM
body: Hi Could you please take Sona out of ARAM. I know it is a 'fun' mode but it just creates an unfair advantage when one team can perpetually group heal at such capacity and the other team can't recall. I've played thousands of ARAM games as the only mode I enjoy after all these years (Except the special events like URF) and even less than optimal players with a Sona carry their teams to a win. It's flat out unfair as a result of the game mode mechanic of not being able to recall and please just perma ban her from it. Please this is my only request of you after years of being a loyal customer.

replies.body: Stop complaining about a **RANDOM** game mode, the chances of it being fair in any situation is slim at best. There are worse champions to end up against in ARAM than Sona.
Im not complaining about anything I am saying by nature of the game mode with limited healing the character is vastly outbalanced over any other character.

Sounds like complaining to me. We're talking about a **RANDOM** based game mode, you can't expect it to be fair most times. In fact you can't expect it to be fair ever. Sona is not the only champ that is "OP" in ARAM, nor is she the worst.

When we talk about heals {{champion:16}} must be mentioned. Soraka's heals is 100% OP in ARAM and Soraka can sustain herself with her Q and since this is ARAM people will just go full offensive on items and Soraka heals work with more AP and her Ult is completely broken in ARAM. Although i main Soraka i don't think she should be allowed to play in ARAM because it is almost a guaranteed win if Soraka is in the game.
